title: Julius Caesar [Excerpts]
subject_group: Literature/English literature - Film and video adaptations
Literature/Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616 - Film and video adaptations
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Drama - Study and teaching

Music & Performing Arts/Drama - Study and teaching
description: So that people who have had no opportunity of seeing Shakespeare's plays staged may see leading English actors in a full-scale stage production, these excerpts from "Julius Caesar" have been filmed, sponsored by the British Council. The cast includes Leo Genn as Marc Antony; Felix Aylmer as Brutus; and John Slater, Emrys Jones, Frederick Cooper, Ben Williams, Grqace Allardyce, Arthur Hambling and Sydney Monckton among the other players.
